Item ID269

Torstol is the highest level herb, which requires level 75 Herblore to clean and yields 15 experience. Torstol can be grown in herb patches at level 85 Farming with a Torstol seed.

Obtaining torstol herbs may be difficult as they are only rarely dropped by monsters. They can be obtained by Farming, looting nature implings, or rarely as drops from Zulrah and the Kalphite Queen. They can also be obtained in their grimy form from the Sinister chest, Skotizo, Cerberus, and the Chambers of Xeric. To create a Zamorak brew, you need to add the cleaned herb to a vial of water to create a torstol potion (unf), and then add jangerberries.

According to the book Gielinor's flora - herbs, the name comes from Torst, an old Fremennik word meaning thirsty. This refers to the plant's need for a lot of water, and as such is often found growing near rivers and ponds.

A torstol may also be given to the Dr Jekyll random event in exchange for a Stamina potion(4).

Uses[edit | edit source]

Potion/item Level Second
Ingredient 		XP Effect/usage
Zamorak brew 78 Jangerberries 175 Boosts Strength by 12% + 2, Attack by 20% + 2.
Decreases Defence by 10% + 2 and Hitpoints by 12%.
Restores ~10% prayer points.
Super combat potion 90 Super attack(4)
Super strength(4)
Super defence(4) 		150 Boosts Attack, Strength, and Defence by 5 + 15%, rounded down
Anti-venom+ 94 Anti-venom 125 Cures venom and poison.
Provides a three and twelve minute immunity to venom and poison respectively.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 October 2016
(update)

The Jekyll random event can now ask for a clean torstol if you have one.

8 January 2015
(update)

Super anti-venom can be made by adding a Torstol onto it.

14 August 2014
(update | poll)

Torstol may now be used as a component to make Super combat potion.
